entry.title: Dynamically Controlled Bitcoin Block Size Max Cap
entry.summary: The writer of this message is familiar with the Bitcoin issues and the need for addressing risk in a systematic way. They have noticed that many good posts on the topic are dispersed among thousands of messages and discussions in various contexts, resulting in repetitive arguments and wasted time. The writer suggests that knowing a technical area and knowing a process to analyze metrics are two different things. The writer is glad that the recipient of the message wants to participate in such a process. Several developers on the list have mentioned the need for a decentralization metric, so the writer thinks that it is a good place to start. The writer suggests getting other developers and experts together to send the various information and tools they have. The writer will put everything together into a usable format. The goal is to create a living document that people can use to discuss changes in a similar context. In conclusion, the writer of the message is an expert on Bitcoin issues and analyzing metrics. They suggest creating a living document to address these issues and have offered to help put it together.
